metadata.title: CVE-2023-0415 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
iSCSI dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 andallows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0415` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 4.0.3-1
libwireshark17t64 - 4.0.3-1
libwiretap14t64 - 4.0.3-1
libwsutil15t64 - 4.0.3-1
tshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark - 4.0.3-1
wireshark-common - 4.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-1').
